working example.description: example of a simple function (no commas!)

no_command_test.description: Should fail and throw warning: WARNING - For no_command_test, command or variables were not correctly specified! Please check calc_command.json

no_variable_test.description: Should fail and throw warning: WARNING - For no_variable_test, command or variables were not correctly specified! Please check calc_command.json

no_fill_value_test.description: Should pass and log should display: 'For no_fill_value_test, 'fill_value' was set to a default of 'null'

no_column_test.description: Should fail and throw warning: WARNING - For no_column_test, columns specified were not found! Please correct!
